explains: n. 人造黄油；人造奶油

sentences.en: Margarine can be substituted for butter in this recipe.
sentences.cn: 做这道菜可以用人造黄油代替黄油。

sentences.en: Sunflower margarine has the same fat content as butter.
sentences.cn: 葵花籽人造黄油跟黄油的脂肪含量一样。

sentences.en: Butter can be substituted with margarine in this recipe.
sentences.cn: 做这道菜可以用人造黄油代替黄油。
